Ubik is lightweight, elegant, no-external web service linked and easy to use package manager. Inspired by the elegant Homebrew for OSX.

You are currently looking at the documentation of the development release.

Feedback

Feedback is greatly appreciated. If you have any questions, comments, random praise, or anonymous threats, shoot me an email.
